price: 54. Diggah amah Ni-rizqhiy ambaxe sinniy aggiriqqewaa keenik iyya Yalli.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
